title: Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Juuni Kyuu-hen - Yomigaerishi Gold Saint-tachi no Shinwa
original_name: 冥王ハーデス十二宮編　よみがえりし黄金聖闘士たちの神話
ending_song: "Kimi to Onaji Aozora" by Matsuzawa Yumi
sinopse: Is a summary of the Saga Hades Sanctuary from the perspective of the golden knights resurrected, especially Shura, Camus and Saga.
